channel.title: AWS Organizations Integration on Service Catalog Tools Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in AWS Organizations Integration on Service Catalog Tools Workshop

item.title: Adding Accounts using Organizational Units (OU)
item.description: What are we going to do? This tutorial will walk you through “Adding Accounts using Organizational Units (OU)". We are going to perform the following steps: create a manifest file add accounts to the manifest file using AWS Organizations OU add a spoke-local-portfolios to the manifest file During this process you will check your progress by verifying what the framework is doing at each step. Step by step guide Here are the steps you need to follow to “Adding Accounts using Organizational Units (OU)”

item.title: Sharing a portfolio using AWS Organizations
item.description: What are we going to do? This tutorial will walk you through “Sharing a portfolio using AWS Organizations” to OU member accounts. Doing this will allow the framework to share Service Catalog Portfolios by using AWS Organizations OUs, rather than account-to-account sharing. This will reduce the time required to share Portfolios. We are going to perform the following steps: enable organizational sharing create a manifest file add an account to the manifest file add a spoke-local-portfolios to the manifest file During this process you will check your progress by verifying what the framework is doing at each step.
